I'll echo this, too, about Val not being usable after reharnessing.  I've tried reharnessing a few times, and the first step I try to take she essentially just sits down.  [Here's a video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T3AE5xG3I-0) trying to move the left foot forward only 5cm.

Val seems to drop a few meters in the world frame each time I reharness (looking at /world to /pelvis in TF, shown in picture).  This seems relevant because when reharnessed, the first thing that happens is she stands as tall as she can, hitting the knee joint limits -- she's trying to reach her pelvis position prior to reharnessing, which is now impossible.  She also is trying to reach her previous torso orientation. I'm wondering if this is throwing off the walk controller. ![val_before_after.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xEbAAe/images/3266145333-val_before_after.png)
